name: Spellcaster (itch) (slumbgod, SmDaniels)
description:
Defend inoccent villagers from evil spirits! You can use different spells to elliminate your enemies: fireball from underworld, demonic lightning or energy projectile. 

Every spell has it's own way of cast. You can always check guidebook from pause menu.
And don't forget: a spell can be effective on one type of enemies, but less suitable for another!

Controls: mouse/touch. FOR MOUSE: click&hold to simulate touching.
